sentences.sContent: Fact: Apparently this condiment can reinstate shine to your small change.
sentences.sContent_eng: Fact: Apparently this condiment can reinstate shine to your small change.
sentences.sCn: 事实：这显然是调味品的小改变让事物恢复光芒。

sentences.sContent: So in an attempt to see if I can change my reaction to this common condiment I thought I'd try a not very scientific experiment.
sentences.sContent_eng: So in an attempt to see if I can change my reaction to this common condiment I thought I'd try a not very scientific experiment.
sentences.sCn: 所以说就算要做个测试来看我能不能改变我对普遍调味品的反应，我宁愿选择一个不那么科学的实验。

trans.tranOther: a powder or liquid, such as salt or  ketchup  , that you use to give a special taste to food
